title: Ep. 219: How Dr. Paul Jarrod Frank is Changing the Conversation on Aging
itunes:title: Ep. 219: How Dr. Paul Jarrod Frank is Changing the Conversation on Aging
itunes:subtitle: Cosmetic dermatologist Dr. Paul Jarrod Frank joins us to talk about his new book, "The Pro-Aging Playbook," which dares to go deeper than others in its category. Expect straight talk (mixed with a little spirituality) about our youth-obsessed...
description:
Cosmetic dermatologist Dr. Paul Jarrod Frank joins us to talk about his new book, "The Pro-Aging Playbook," which dares to go deeper than others in its category. Expect straight talk (mixed with a little spirituality) about our youth-obsessed culture, and real advice about how you can block out the noise focus on looking and feeling your best. Also, grab a pencil: Dr. Frank shares *exactly* what to look for in a practitioner, should you ever decide to get injectables or anything more serious. -- Want more Fat Mascara? Take our listener survey: fatmascara.com/survey; Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
